Text: Chapter II (Ashanti album):  "Chapter II" spawned three singles including the "Billboard" Hot 100 number two song "Rock Wit U (Awww Baby)", the R&B-ballad "Rain on Me" and the Irv Gotti-produced "Breakup 2 Makeup (Remix)".
